title: Airbnb is rolling out a new design to encourage travel discovery
content:
Travel booking company Airbnb is rolling out a new design for its website and app to encourage the discovery of different places and facilitate longer stays. The firm says this is its biggest redesign in years. The marquee feature is called Categories, and it lets you explore homes around the world â€” rather than search for something specific. With this, Airbnb aims to inspire people to think about traveling in the future, or taking longer trips.
